hero.title: Never forget again.
hero.desc: Track your aligner wear time effortlessly. One-tap logging and smart reminders help you stay on track with your orthodontic journey.

features.title:
Everything you need
for orthodontic success
features.desc: From wear tracking to reminders and analytics. All the tools you need to manage your aligner journey in one place.

items.title: One-Tap Tracking
items.desc: Log wearing and removal with a single tap. View your daily wear pattern on a timeline.

items.title: Smart Reminders
items.desc: Get notified when your aligners have been out too long. Snooze support ensures you put them back at the right time.

items.title: Statistics
items.desc: Visualize your wear habits with weekly and monthly charts. Track goal achievement and average removal time.

items.title: Schedule Management
items.desc: Automatically manage your aligner change schedule. Never miss your next switch date.

items.title: Widgets
items.desc: Check and toggle your wear status from the Home Screen or Lock Screen. Live Activities supported.

items.title: iCloud Backup
items.desc: Securely sync your data with iCloud. Seamlessly share data across multiple devices.

how.title: Get started in 3 steps
how.desc: Setup takes less than a minute. Start tracking right away.

steps.title: Enter your orthodontic info
steps.desc: Set your start date, total number of aligners, and change frequency. You can also enter which aligner you're currently on.

steps.title: Start logging daily
steps.desc: Just tap when you put in or take out your aligners. You can also use widgets, so you don't even need to open the app.

steps.title: Stay on track with reminders
steps.desc: Get automatic notifications when your aligners have been out too long. Build better wearing habits naturally.

pro.title:
Deeper insights,
flexible control
pro.desc: Unlock advanced statistics, customizable notifications, and more to support your orthodontic journey.

items.title: Detailed Statistics
items.desc: Access in-depth data including average removal time and goal achievement days.

items.title: Advanced Notifications
items.desc: Set different alarm timings for different times of day. Morning, afternoon, and evening.

items.title: iCloud Backup
items.desc: Safely back up your data to iCloud. Automatically synced across devices.

items.title: Custom Schedules
items.desc: Customize wear days per aligner. Flexible management tailored to your orthodontic plan.

languages.title: Available in 14 languages
languages.desc: Built for aligner users around the world.
